about_the_game: Tokyo Stranger is a fictional text-based dark survival game inspired by the opening ceremony of the 2020 Tokyo Olympics. The DEMO version provides a 15-minute simple process experience.
detailed_description: Tokyo Stranger is a fictional text-based dark survival game inspired by the opening ceremony of the 2020 Tokyo Olympics. The DEMO version provides a 15-minute simple process experience.
name: Tokyo Stranger 东京诡事 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows8
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx2060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Tokyo Stranger is a fictional text-based dark survival game inspired by the opening ceremony of the 2020 Tokyo Olympics. The DEMO version provides a 15-minute simple process experience.
